Event.name: Scouring
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Searcher</fen> looks all over a <fen>Ground</fen> in order to find a <fen>Sought_entity</fen>. The <fen>Sought_entity</fen> is not presupposed to exist. The search activity is not concerned with the state of the <fen>Ground</fen>, which is the case in the Inspecting frame, but only with the finding of the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>, which is desirable.
<ex><fex name="sea">The newcomers</fex> <t>combed</t> <fex name="gro">the area</fex> looking for minerals</ex> <ex><fex name="sea">Scientists</fex> <t>scoured</t> <fex name="gro">the ice samples</fex> <fex name="sou">for signs of life</fex>. </ex> <ex><fex name="sea">Mulder</fex> <t>rummaged</t> <fex name="gro">through his toilet kit</fex> <fex name="sou">for a plastic razor</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Searcher
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who is looking all over the <fen>Ground</fen> for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="sea">They</fex> first gained entry into the house of Raja Rao, who resides on the ground floor and <t>ransacked</t> the house for valuables.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The location that the <fen>Searcher</fen> covers in looking for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex>I had never really seen much on the bigfoot subject or I would have <t>scoured</t> <fex name="gro">the area</fex> for signs and looked for droppings</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Sought_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity that the <fen>Searcher</fen> wants to find.
<ex>Coast Guard and Navy ships and aircraft <t>combed</t> the area <fex name="sou">for the six aircraft</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Searcher</fen> scrutinizes the <fen>Ground</fen>.
<ex>We <fex name="man">carefully</fex> <t>scoured</t> the road for what damaged all of those tires and we finally found it- a piece of nasty, barbed wire, laying across the road.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE specifies the length of the interval during which the scouring activtiy takes place.
<ex>He <t>combed</t> the area <fex name="dur">for hours</fex> that night looking for the dogs and has been searching ever since.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Searcher</fen> scrutinizes the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An entity manipulated by the <fen>Searcher</fen> to examine the <fen>Ground</fen>.
<ex>They <t>scoured</t> the entire beach <fex name="ins">with a metal detector</fex>, but found nothing.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Searcher</fen> that allows them to search the <fen>Ground</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Searcher</fen> hopes to bring about by searching a <fen>Ground</fen>.
<ex>We <t>scoured</t> the entire book <fex name="pur">to find this supposed evidence</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: sift.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: examine thoroughly so as to isolate that which is important or useful.

lexUnit.name: sweep.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: search or survey (an area) for something.

lexUnit.name: sweep.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an act of searching (an area) for something.

lexUnit.name: rummage.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make a thorough but untidy search through
